Meta.title: Residents Eat With You
Meta.author: OmegaPlatinum
Meta.description:
When you start eating at a [b]Dining Spot Sign[/b], residents will join you to eat together. 食堂の立札の近くで食事を始めると、住人が一緒に食事をします。
[h1] Features [/h1] [list] [*] Residents will join you for meals when you eat near a [b]Dining Spot Sign[/b]. [*] Residents will increase their affinity with you. [*] Food priority is as follows: [list] [*] From their inventory [*] From shared containers [*] Randomly generated if no food is available [/list] [/list]
[h1] Compatibility [/h1] This mod works with existing save files.
Supports Game Version: 0.23.75
[h1] 特徴 [/h1] [list] [*] [b]食堂の立札[/b]の近くでプレイヤーが食事を始めると、住人が参加して一緒に食事をします。 [*] 住人はプレイヤーとの親密度を上げます。 [*] 食べ物の優先度は次の通りです: [list] [*] 自分のインベントリから [*] 共有コンテナから [*] 食べ物がない場合はランダム生成 [/list] [/list]
[h1] 互換性 [/h1] このMODは既存のセーブデータと完全に互換性があります。
対応ゲームバージョン: 0.23.75
